ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 203
ComicInfo.Series: Survival Story Of A Sword King In A Fantasy World
ComicInfo.Summary:
A brief description of the manhua Survival Story Of A Sword King In A Fantasy World:
He was a normal man who was fired from military service and moved to another world. Left to his own fate, he was given the goal of surviving and strengthening in a desert world filled with monsters and other creatures. The problem is that the “Guideline”, which was to become his guiding system for survival, was filled with errors. Read the new manga series on our website.
Alternative Names: The Survival Record of the Sword King in Another World,Otherworldly Sword King's Survival Records
ComicInfo.Genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Isekai, Martial arts, Tragedy, Webtoon, Manhua
